channel.title: Can log in with 2+ people. PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Hi, i get this error when i try to log in and it says:
Connection from (my ip) Connection reset java.net.socketexpeption: connection reset at java.net.socketinputstream.read<unknown> at client.fullinstream<client.java:10175> at client.run<client.java:18999> at java.lang.thread.run<unknown source>
Please help me.

item.title: Can log in with 2+ people. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @hyphy_ftw hyphy ftw
item.description:
@hyphy_ftw wrote:

public static int MaxConnections = 100000;

is what its always been, so yeah. would someone be able to add me on msn and tell me ?
Fully.sick.nick@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Can log in with 2+ people. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Master_Chef Master Chef
item.description:
@Master_Chef wrote:

You are stupid go into Server.java and then look for the Connections += 2 or whatever number u have and change it to higher or lower.

Read full topic
item.source: Can log in with 2+ people. PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Can log in with 2+ people. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Noobinator9907 Noobinator9907
item.description:
@Noobinator9907 wrote:

What connection are you using for port forwarding? If it’s Hamachi then you should try renewing and getting a new connection, that can sometimes help, if it’s No-IP it’s a problem with your server because usually they don’t screw up, but you can try renewing that too. Also if your using a web client not a download able one that can sometimes mess it up.

Read full topic
item.source: Can log in with 2+ people. PLEASE HELP!

item.description:
@I_Uk_0wn4g3_I wrote:

warlock 999:

Maybe it only allows 2 ips on at once, idk. It’s your server, You should know more about it.

Maybe its not his server and hes using another server for a base

Read full topic
